name: Cone of Cold
summary: Cone of Cold (Evocation) aus dem AD&D 2e Player's Handbook.

source_text.raw_block:
Cone of Cold (Evocation)
Range: 0
Components: V, S, M
Duration: Instantaneous
Casting Time: 5
Area of Effect: Special
Saving Throw: 1/2
When this spell is cast, it causes a cone-
shaped area of extreme cold, originating at
the wizards hand and extending outward in
a cone five feet long and one foot in diame-
ter per level of the caster. It drains heat and
causes ld4 + 1 points of damage per level of
experience of the wizard. For example, a
10th-level wizard would cast a cone of cold
10 feet in diameter and 50 feet long, causing
1Od4 + 10 points of damage.
Its material component is a crystal or
glass cone of very small size.
